title: If the owner of the building has not proposed appropriate measures required to safeguard the constru
clause_text: If the owner of the building has not proposed appropriate measures required to safeguard the construction from constantly getting damp to the satisfaction of the Authority;
section: Site not Eligible for Construction of Building

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
